title: [DLC] BioShock Infinite (Clash In The Clouds + Update 1.1.22.464
description:

Description:
This first expansion focused on the combat component of BioShock Infinite. Combine weapons, energy, gears, breaks and aerotrassy most unimaginable ways and get out of the most difficult situations. You will test 60 4 brand new maps. Take the test "Blue Ribbon" and open sketches golosofony, kinetoscopes etc. at Columbia Archaeological Society.

Installation:
1. Install BioShock Infinite [Steam-Rip] by RG Origins.
2. Install this add-on.
3. Copy the contents of folder "Crack" to the game folder.
* Language switched in file "3DMGAME.ini" or "Unleashed.ini" (default - Russian)
